choices: It's all down here from here.
1.content:
In a strange wilderness somewhere set in a forest of sorts was a small, but peaceful village. Most people were friendly, loving and helped each other out in times of crisis. The village had a population of about one hundred citizens, and each of these citizens went about a normal day. The village was antiquated, but still lived in harmony with nature, using every peace of scrap they could find. They were happy where they were.

But where exactly are they? Surrounding the village is nothing but a vast forest as far as one can see and be willing to travel. No one really had been outside of the village in a long time. Legend has it that there once were a group of pilgrims who bravely wandered off and were attacked by enormous monsters and never heard of again! ...but those are simply just legends, right? Perhaps, but perhaps not. You see this forest where the peaceful villagers live is actually just the backyard to a house lived in by four girls.To the girls, the village would simply just look like an ant colony, or just a gathering of bugs. The village was tiny, and the citizens are just about 1 millimeter in scale compared to one of the girls.

Both the girls and the villagers lived completely opposite and unaware to one another, that is up until now...
1.title: In shock and Awe.

choices: Become wanderers and explore beyond their homes.
Stay here in the village and wait to see how they can help.
11.content: The village seems to be running into some hard times as of late, they were running out of supplies rather quickly, and stories about the giant monsters were becoming more and more frequent. As the days past, the townsfolk urged their leaders to make some changes, imploring that they explore far beyond their village. A small group of individuals, Glen, Justin, Nick, and Ricko decided that they weren't going to be tolerating this any longer. They thought that waiting around and watching their village fall about due to lack of supplies was not the way they wanted this all to end. So rather then wait for their leaders to make a move, they asked themselves, "what should we do?"
11.title: It's all down here from here.

111.content:
The four of them gathered up some supplies and essentials and snuck out of the village early in the morning. The began their trip though the wilderness, chopping down branches and shrubbery that got in their way. Time past quickly as their journey took age, hours turned into days, and soon enough the encountered trouble. A back of gross looking alien like species emerged in front of them. They were horrid looking, with black exoskeletons and wild like pincers. They were vile, they were large....they were merely ants, but to the four adventurers, they were they enemy. The four stood their ground bravely as the hideous beast swarmed them, and like a zombie apocalypse, the four heroes banded together and slew the monsters. They cleaned off their blades and scavenged the beasts' carcase.

Later, they set up camp in a larger, more open sector. They lit a small campfire and rested for the night. Soon enough the group was woken up by loud booms that shook the very floor they were sleeping on. The sound grew louder and an enormous mountain like figure emerged out of the sunlight. Its' mass plopped right next to the group, nearly flattening their existence, and then suddenly it lifted up and vanished as quickly as it appeared. The sounds grew fainter and the shaking slowly diminished, but the most unsettling aspect was that what ever that thing is, was now headed strait to where their village is located!

The four heroes now needed to make a choice, should they run back to the village, a trip that took them a full day, or should they press onward?
111.title: Become wanderers and explore beyond their homes.

choices: Follow the events of the Village.
1111.content:
Glen seems to have a grim look upon his face..

"All seems lost..." He said with grimace in his voice.

He forces the rest of them to move onward... the group pushed forwards, slowly while they looked back over their shoulders.

"I hope the village will be okay..." the group said together.

The groups march seems to slow, they are thinking about their homes, their friends, and all their families being destroyed by this horrific, unforgiving monster... but what is this terrible beast? Well, this beast isn't so much a beast as it is a beauty. It was a lovely girl named Sammy, she was wandering around in her backyard walking toward the vegetable garden to pick some fresh strawberries. Unfortunately for the tiny village, they are located right in the vegetable garden! Sammy walked blissfully unaware of the tiny village in her path, but she slowly strolled about. She loved how the grass and the earth felt underneath her bare feet.

The tiny village felt their earth start to rumble and they could see a large figure start to make its' dramatic appearance. They inhabitants began to gather around in awe of the impressive sight, it was definitely a beautiful sight, Sammy was something to look at. She has long brown hair that she wears in a pony tail, and a fine body. She did not disappoint.

The villagers all stood together and glared up at the impressive sight, even the villagers that are supposed to be guarding their most prized possession stared up in awe, but did not leave their posts. What was their most prized possession? It was the source where they received most of their food. It was a rather large, and red object filled with nectar. It was essentially just a strawberry.... and there was about ten guards defending it.
1111.title: Press onward.

11111.content:
The tiny troop continued on their way hoping the best for their village. They would have no way of knowing what happened, so they plowed ahead. Within a few hours they realized they were on the edge of the forest. The ground in front of them was a gray color with small sharp spikes sticking out of it.

Just beyond, they could see the largest house they had ever seen. It would probably take them another few hours to get there, but maybe they could find a place of safety there. That was, unless there were more of those giant beauties. If so, it was inevitable that would be trampled, or worse.

The ground started to shake again, and they knew they would have to find cover.
11111.title: Follow the four heroes Journey.

111111.content:
The dirt beneath them seem to jump with a sound that increased by the second. Glen, Justin, Nick, and Ricko were under the immense shadow of the maniacal Cara.
Britney will never find her necklace buried here in the back yard. All the girls like her better than me. She’ll totally flip when she realizes it’s gone.”
She had in her hand a small shovel. She stood still and looked at the deep green grass. The young girl knelt down and as she did her immense face hovered over the four companions. Then they were knocked of their feet and fell backwards as the ground beneath them started to rise and suddenly Glen cried out.
“What is she doing!”
Seconds afterwards they were tumbling at a steep downhill angle that occurred as Cara dumped the dirt out of the shovel. The four now found themselves buried under layers of soil that they desperately tried to emerge from. One by one they reached the wonderful open air. Nick was the first one to speak.
“What could she have possibly meant to achieve by breaking up ground like that and then just dumping it?”
“Do you think she knows we’re here?” answered Glen.
“But why would someone want to kill innocent beings for no reason?” questioned Justin.
“Well what will we do now? We have no idea where we are and that giant may decimate our village,”said Ricko.
111111.title: Does the group encounter Cara?

1111111.content:
"Let's split up and search," said Nick. They all went in different directions.

Glen was off near the park benches when Cara came and sat on the benches for a rest.

Does she notice him?
1111111.title: Split up and search

choices: Cara goes home to play with her pet
11111111.content:
Glen had wandered near the park bench were Cara had been sitting, and unintentionally gotten close to Caras empty sneaker, as she had taken them off to let her bare feet get fresh air. Glen was drawn to the sneaker becuase it was emitting a strong stench and releasing heat. Cara looked down seeing a bug near her shoe.

Cara looked down at the bug, and noticed it looked strange. The bug had 2 legs and 2 arms and a humanoid body. Cara reached down and plucked the bug up with her fingers, taking the bug to her face

Glen was terrified when the giant raised him to her face, fearing the worse. The giant simply stared at him and than said "if you understand me nod". Glen nodded in fear. The giant now knew that this was no bug, but a tiny man. "I think I'm gonna keep you, as a pet!" Said Cara as her face turned into a smile. She didn't have any pockets so she dropped the man into her shoe, rolled him into the toe section, and put her bare foot in it, and laced the shoe.

Glen was in between this women's toes, as the heat rose and sweat came down on him, as cara began to walk home, with her new pet snuggly between her toes.
11111111.title: 1st encounter

choices: Go back to the village and start again in the morning.
Split up and search for Ricko and Justin
Set up camp and hope the wayward friends find their own way back.
1112.content:
They took a vote, and 3 out of 4 said to press onward. The only one who voted against going ahead was Glen and since he was their leader he overrode the vote. The four of them preceded back the way they came. Heading, dejected back the their village to await whatever fate had in store for them. They were halfway home when Justin just plain disappeared. He had been right there a second ago and now they had no idea where he was.

Ricko thought he heard him in the tall shrubs to the left so he raced into them hoping to find his friend quickly. Nick started to join him when Glen yelled.

"Just where do you think you're going?"

" I need to help find Justin," he explained a little taken aback by the question.

"No, we already are missing two of us. If you go then I don't know where anyone is," Glen stated matter-of-factually.

Now there was a huge problem. It was getting dark and they had no camp set up yet. Glen and Nick could make it back to the village and start out again in the morning or they could continue the search at night.
1112.title: Head back to the village!!

choices: She accidently steps on the village
She realizes what the tiny "bugs" are...
11121.content:
Back at the village, things seemed pretty normal. They day was winding down to an end, things were quiet.

After some time had past a few of our heroes returned home, empty handed. That's is when everything started to change. The earth beneath their feet shook, the sky quickly darkened... from below a fowl creature stood above. Looming.

From above it was a girl named Cara who was simply standing around outside, doing nothing in particular. She had taken her sandals off and was holding them with her two fingers. She liked him the soil felt on her bare feet. She tapped them slowly on the ground below...

She suddenly felt something sharp below and looked down. Tiny life forms were scattering about with oddly shipped structures...

Cara raised an eye brow and begone squinting...
11121.title: Go back to the village and start again in the m...

choices: One of the girls calls her over
111211.content: She thinks it's probly nothing a raises her foot towards the village. The shadow of her foot blinds the whole village as her foot comes down on top of the village. What happens next?
111211.title: She accidently steps on the village

11122.content:
"This is ridiculous! We will never find them in all of this brush... I knew I should of just stayed back and wait." Nick said cowardly."

"Stayed back and wait!? For what; to die of starvation? To be destroyed by those monsters? Get a hold of yourself, there was nothing else we could of done but this! This is our fate, our destiny to become adventurers; just stay calm and help me look." Glen lectured.

Glen and Nick continued their search for their comrades together, they refused to become separated again, for the knew that their only hope of survival, and finding their friends was with determination, and both mental and physical prowess. The duo searched every where they could think; inside a cave, through the jungle, even under rocks. It almost seemed as if they had disappeared entirely.

Hope seemed to fade all too quickly with the diminishing light, and almost like an extinguished flame the two of their morals slipped away. They sat down in defeat and thought about Justin and Ricko. "What could have happened to them?" They both though to themselves. As pity and fear got the best of them, there was something else lurking about in the shadows, and had been for some time. Glen and Nick had been too preoccupied to take notice, Just then, a group of bandits dressed only in loin clothes emerged and surrounded them. Nick and Glen were taken off guard as they scrambled to find something to defend themselves with, and just as they did, they were knocked unconscious by one of the bandits....
11122.title: Split up and search for Ricko and Justin

choices: Grasp onto the giant girl's toes.
111221.content:
"Hey Glen! Glen! Wake up!" Justin said in a hush as he lightly tapped Glen in the face to wake him up.

"Ju-...Justin? What? Where... are we? What happened?" Glen questioned

"Shhhh! They will here us! I don't know man, at first I was following you, and next thing I know is I was getting snagged off into the dark woods..." Justin responded.

"Where's Ricko?" Glen asked.

"I have know clue! I was hoping he was with you. These bandits tied me up here, but I was able to make an escape when they weren't looking, and now I'm going to get us the hell out of here!" Justin said

Justin took out a rusted knife he had acquired from his escape, he bent down to Glen and began to slowly saw off his bondage so they could run. Things seemed to be taking much longer then expected, Justin kept trying to cut Glen free. The more he exerted himself the greater the risk he took at drawing attention. Soon enough he had found himself surrounded by the bandits again. They pointed spears at them and forced them to stand up, Glen's ropes were only about three quarters of the way torn. The two of them rose to their feet and stood in obedience. Glen spoke out.

"Where are my other two friends?" He demanded, but the bandits stayed silent. They simply nudged the two of them along

Glen and Justin were getting agitated, they didn't want their journey to end at the hands of some bandits, so they took of in a full sprint, the bandits reacted quickly and gave chase. They ran and bolted, juking out trees (blades of grass) and other things, until they got into an open patch of badlands. The two of them were running out of breath, while the bandits did not show any sign of relenting... Just as the bandits had caught up to them, and readied their weapons, everyone felt the tremors that shook the earth once more... and with in an instant, an enormous figure made it's appearance overhead. There was no trees, or foliage to obscure their view... it was a gigantic woman. It was Sammy walking back from the garden. She was unfathomably immense, and then suddenly they saw her giant barefoot block out the light above them. It came down slowly and cast a shadow that dwarfed everything they ever knew... and then the giant's foot fell flat on the surface. The sole of her foot smothered the group of attacking bandits, and smashed them into the earth, while Glen and Justin fit safely between her toes, just out of her crushing impact. They felt her weight shift as the giant girl began to lift her foot away. You could see some of the tiny bandits squished on her soft under sole of her bare foot. They needed to make a decision, should they grab onto her toes and try to find out some answers, or do they let the giant leave and look for their other two friends?
111221.title: Once they awoke...

choices: The Equestrian, is it a hotel or a vision?
1112211.content:
Glen woke with a start, he had been dreaming. Justin who had been awake for a few minutes splashed water from a bottle on his face and smiled.

"So the man awakes. What were you dreaming about. It looked as though you were in a war the way you were squirming around. Am I glad you have returned to the living."

"I don't know. Just been through the most enormous trial. Thought I was going to be shot by bandits, but we are in the local park, so how the hell? Why are we still here Justin?"

"It must have been a dream. Now get your gear together and don't forget your leather jacket, we are going to a hotel for the day. I have enough bucks in the pocket and we can have a proper bath and wholesome food. How does that sound my man?"

Glen looked at Justin and his face said it all. He muttered something about being in the middle of a nightmare. "it will be heaven sent," he said.

Justin packed his belongings and patted Glen on the back. "Come on then, let's find a decent hotel. The two men walked slowly out of the park and walked towards the west of the city. life seemed normal for all the people that were going about there business, but the two men were changed forever.
"Here! Justin interrupted. The equestrian. This will do."
Glen followed his friend like a lost lamb.
1112211.title: Look for Ricko and Nick/

choices: Sammy Enters the House with Justin and Glen still on her toes.
1112212.content:
Justin and Glen were awe inspired, they reacted quickly and instinctively gasped onto the webs of the giant girl's toes. She began to lift her foot up and her two puny ride-a-longs could feel the pressure as the G forces shifted and put a strain on their tiny bodies. With each footstep, the duo could see the parts of the earth that they once called a forest flatten, and give under the enormous pressure of the giant girl. It was quite the thrill ride, but the two tine villagers could not enjoy it in the least bit, due to the fact that they needed their full attentions on staying "un-flattened" themselves.

While hanging on for dear life, Glen can see something mildy recognizable up ahead.

"Is that what I think it is!?" He shouted out loud to Justin
"Huh?" Justin Asked
"It looks kinda of like another village! I thought we were alone out here!?" Glen Exclaimed

Justin and Glen had a smile on their faces for the first time in a few days, finally some fruit of their labor, but all did not seem right.

Their smiles dropped quickly as they noticed that Sammy's foot falls were getting dangerously closer and closer to the new tiny village. They knew that if they tried to hop off from here it would be certain death, so they yelled and screamed to maybe warn the village of the impending doom. First came Sammy's right foot, it crashed into the soil next to the village, then the inevitable happened. She raised her left foot and took another casual step. She planted it down heel first, it crashed to the ground right in front of the village, casting a shadow over the whole thing. Time seemed to slow down as Glen and Justin remained as spectators, watching from in between the girl's toes. They watched as the sole of her left foot came crashing down onto the village; crushing buildings and citizens alike.All they could do is stare as the rest of Sammy's foot fell over the remainder of the village, crushing everything with one foot step.

Justin and Glen were horrified and speechless. The only thing that crossed their minds was the thought of if their own village suffered the same fate... Glen looked up to see the look on this monster's face... She didn't even glance down, she didn't even realize that she just destroyed and entire village, generations of people gone in a single moment. She Just kept casually walking as the remnants of debris on bodies fumbled from her under sole.
1112212.title: Grasp onto the giant girl's toes.

choices: Sammy eats face to go home and play
She playa with her pets in her shoe during dinner
11122121.content:
Sammy walked into the house, about to shower, as cara walked into the house. Cara asked Sammy to get dinner with her, so Sammy put on a pair of socks and shoes, and got in the car with cara.

Justin and Glen were in between Sammy mammoth toes, as the toss began to sweat. The tiny men were in a panic, and tried to get the giants attention.

The girls got to the restaurant and got a table, and Sammy felt something between her toes. She went to the restroom to go and see what was moving in between her toes.

She walked into the bathroom and slid her shoe off, than took off her wet sock, and looked between her toes and saw something strange.

Sammy always heard stories of tiny men, but never believed in them. She decided to keep them and take care of them and play with the men.

"Don't worry little fellas, I won't hurt you. But I have no pockets, so my sock is the only place I can keep you." Said Sammy with a giggle as she put the sock back on and her shoe, keeping her tiny pets stuck with her toes.
11122121.title: Sammy Enters the House with Justin and Glen sti...

112.content:
Just as the decision was made among the group to remain in the village, a man approached Glen, Justin, Nick, and Rico. "Ah, you are all together, that is good." relief in his voice, he said.

"What is this about?" curious, Glen asked.

"The elder has summoned you for a very important mission." serious, the man replied. "One that may save our village from a slow death."

"The elder?" confused, Justin asked. "I thought there were twelve elders in all."

"They all gave their lives to magically construct a machine that will allow you four to wander beyond our boarders in safety." sadly, the man said. "You four are the best qualified to pilot this machine and bring back supplies for us to have a chance."

This peeked the four boys' curiosity and they followed the man into a large chamber at the base of a towering tree where they found a giant machine that looked like one of them. In actuality, it was nothing more than a boy baby doll that had been reconstructed on the inside with mechanical parts and a magical power source.

"Wow." in awe, Justin said.

"It's huge." stunned, Nick remarked.

"This will allow you to travel outside our boarders." with a weak voice, an old man said. "We all gave everything we had to construct it so do not fail us."

"Um... how does it work?" curious, Rico asked.

"One of you will be the pilot, controlling his arms and legs and voice." simply, the man replied. "The others will be the scout team, gathering items we need and placing them into the storage unit inside the doll."

"You must decide on your own who will lead." the old man added. "The machine is ready for you, good luck."

The four took about an hour to gather supplies for their mission then entered the machine, all sitting inside comfortably in a bridge inside the machine's head. Glen worked the controls and the doll walked away from the village to search for supplies. A few minutes later, they encountered....
112.title: Stay here in the village and wait to see how th...

choices: The girl carries on with her business
One of them makes a run for it, and she attacks
The girl attacks the gang (noticing that they are enemies)
1121.content:
At first, the gang encounter a person (their size) running and screaming for his life just as he was being chased by something. One of the members got out of the doll and grabbed the man that was running for his complete life. The man look like he was in complete fear, and he was screaming like there was no tomorrow, and then suddenly… the man had to snap him out of it. “Calm down, what’s the fear?” Justin said, as he shook the man that was running.

“You have to turn around now…” the man said in fear as he tries to shake Justin off, and the others soon joined him, and Justin is still trying to snap him out. “You got to go now… if she finds you… she”

“Dude, relax… relax, nothing is coming for you.” Rico added.

“She knows our methods, and she is coming to destroy us!!!!” the man panicked again, but even more so in fear, and then suddenly…. The ground started to rumble.

There was a bunch of thunderous steps that shook the ground and the machine off its feet, and then… a huge shadow emerged and overwhelmed the land, and everyone turns up to look to see that it was a huge 20 year old girl, Cara!



The team was all in awe, and in absolute shock and maybe even terror as the girl turned to look and see the baby doll, and it’s men that controlled it. She crawled herself down and look at the men and one of them ordered (it was Glen) “Don’t move a muscle or make a sound, these monsters respond to those elements.”

The girl looked at the gang for a few moments, and even got close of them (all were in fear) as she smelt them with her nose, noticing that they are… worthy of blood. Then suddenly….
1121.title: RUN!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

choices: the woman takes the 'doll' to the house
the woman is a witch that orginally shrank the village
1122.content:
....an adult woman. She was about 40 years old, and had straight black hair down to her bare shoulders. Her clothes, a tank top and sweatpants were basic, considering she was out for a jog. Generally the woman would be considered pretty, except she had a dark look in her eyes which deterred most people that saw her. "Hmmp. Some little girl must had left this outside" the woman said, she voice harsh.

inside the head, all four men remained quiet. They knew how important it was to maintain stealth, especially after hearing the tales. Mostly about the giants smashing them like those annoying flying.. things. In reality, the only reason they were squatted like flies was that any adult that encountered them thought they couldn't be real, hence the adults treating them like 'stressed out' images.
1122.title: An adult girl.

1123.content: What kind of Animal was it?
1123.title: An Animal

11231.content:
They came across a small brown Dachshund, no bigger then the doll really, the Men were scared stiff though, as they had never seen such an animal before.

"Glen..." Ricko aid nervously "What in the world is that?"

"I don't know." Glen said "But...It seems to be coming closer!"

The Dachshund came up to the doll and sniffed the face and started to lick it.

After realizing the baby doll was not alive the Dog decided to...
11231.title: A Dog

11232.content:
Glen was just settling into the routine of operating the huge machine, while his friends were bickering about who got to sit in which seat, when they encountered something terrifying!

A short distance in front of them was an enourmous, feral beast! It had luminous green eyes, thick fur, and sharp teeth and claws...and it had seen them!

"Guys!" Glen shouted, "you'd better hold onto something!"

As the beast slowly stalked closer to them, Glen...
11232.title: A Cat!

11233.content:
There was a small brown Rabbit sitting on her hind legs grooming herself.

The Men were frozen with fear, they had never seen such and animal before, they didn't know what it would do with them.

"Glen..." Ricko said "What do you suppose that could be?"

"I don't know..." Glen said "But...It's headed right toward us!"

The Rabbit hopped over to the doll, sniffed it, then licked it...Then decided to...
11233.title: A Rabbit

info.brief_description: An antiquated town soon realizes they aren't as big as they thought...
info.description:
There once lived a village deep in the forest, surrounded by greens for miles. They were quite antiquated, yet they lived happily and peacefully. But, what happens when they soon realize that their town is really no bigger than an ant colony set in the backyard of an all female communal house?

Characters:

(Villagers):
Glen: An outspoken leader amongst his people, and tall (for his size) and has a stern personality.
Justin:A short fellow who is a bit of a goof off. Has short hair, but a sweet looking mustache he likes to wax.
Nick: A shy lanky fellow, nothing special.
Ricko: A true wild card...

(Girls who live in house)

Sammy: a short quirky girl with a fun personality. She has longer Burnett hair, tied back into a pony tail. She tends to be more clumsy and oblivious to her surroundings. She wouldn't hurt a fly... on purpose that is. She tends to not pay too much attention, especially not while eating.

Cara: An athletic blonde girl with medium legnth hair. She looks innocent enough, but she is quite devious. She played with little bugs when she was a kid, sometimes stomping out entire ant hills.

Brittney:A taller girl who is a tad average. She is sociable only around people she knows well. She has long black hair and nice white teeth.

Jennifer: She is a little older, about twenty seven years of age. She is a teacher that likes to unwind on the weekends. She is a little on the weird side and a little dorky, but still attractive. She is a bit of a wild card.
info.pretty_title: A tiny DAY IN THE PARK:
